ABOUT ME

My name is Sagnik Chakraborty, and I am pursuing a Bachelor of Technology at the Academy of Technology. With a passion for technology and innovation, I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in various areas of software development.

I am currently focused on learning JavaScript, C++, and React. These technologies are pivotal in the modern development landscape, and I am enthusiastic about mastering them to build efficient and dynamic applications.

In addition to programming languages, I am also delving into Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Understanding DSA is crucial for problem-solving and optimizing the performance of software, and I am committed to excelling in this area.
